ygData.subject: RE: Hunting at 16
ygData.msgSnippet: I kinda remember that post now that you mentioned it... where is he located? I have a map : ) Thank you, Azerin ... as per the suggestion of someone on this
ygData.messageBody:
I kinda remember that post now that you mentioned it... where is he located?
I have a map : )

Thank you,
Azerin

-----Original Message-----

as per the suggestion of someone on this list, i spent about an hour an a
half killing Jonah Buckler in Lake Rathetear. got me the last half of L15
(man that was a crappy lvl to be). i would suggest buying all your spells
first and stashing them in the bank to save yourself the trip to neriak (or
wherever). if this is your first time in the area, find a map site and
print out the maps of lake rathetear and rathe mtns (mtns especially).

belphenor
